reviewText: If you are a fan of The Wizard of Oz, you will love this documentary!  It provides great historical detail about L. Frank Baum and interviews with members of the Oz community who share their love of the books and the movies.  It is great to see all of the different collector's items from the different collectors that are interviewed.  The Judy Garland collection is great!

The Wonderful World of Oz is a great documentary for any Oz fan. It gives a history of how it all started with L. Frank Baum. This movie interviews and chronicles other authors, artists, and fans work and details the work produced and their heartwarming stories. Seeing the fans collections is amazing. It's a very informative DVD leading into a great welcome from the Oz community into how it all started and continues on to this day.
It's a great film that will transport you into the magical world of Oz and its dedicated fans. I highly recommend it for anyone with any interest in Oz.
